data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Döker, İsmail, Kazak, Cengiz, Karut, Kamil (2017): Three new species of the family Phytoseiidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from Turkey. Zootaxa 4243 (3): 565-576, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4243.3.8|8 occurrences
